column2: "H-hello there. Do I look better than usual? I guess something good did happen."
"The reason is pretty simple, my friend was smiling today, that's enough for me."
"\"It took a while, but I finally made it,\" or at least that's what she said."
"But compared to before, she seems to finally be able to relax, no maybe..."
"...maybe it's always been me worrying and running around trying to become her..."
"I guess that's why she might have done her best so I didn't have to...."
"Sorry, I got carried away talking to myself..."
"Basically it boils down to me being an idiot."
"But that's okay, I'm alright with being an idiot as long as that person is happy."
